DISTRIBUTION IN IRAN ( Fig. 13B ). — Isfahan province .

This species is recorded from Germany and Sweden for the first time. In specimen from Sweden , Dalby, a basivolsella has two subdistal bristles, whereas the other basivolsella has only one subdistal bristle.
